activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devon R Doorn

Attorney Erdman relates.
2 day JT 5/17-5/18/23.

Final pre-trial scheduled for May 9, 2023 at 10:00 am.

2:01 PM Defendant Devon R Doorn in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Devon R Doorn. Attorney Brian Wright appears for the state.  Not guilty pleas entered in all counts.  Return date set for 11/2/2022 at 10:00 AM.  Bond continues.
Hearing scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:15 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devon R Doorn in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Devon R Doorn. 

11:16  Court relates and gives appearances.
11:16  Atty. Erdman indicates defendant wishes to waive right to preliminary hearing.  Court questions Mr. Doorn.  Mr. Doorn indicates he wishes to waive his right to a preliminary hearing. Court questions Atty. Erdman; Court accepts defendant's waiver of preliminary hearing.
Bound over.
Arraignment set; must appear in person.
Bond to continue.
Arraignment scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 7, 2022 at 11:15 am.

1:24 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devon R Doorn in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman did not appear.
Court relates JA will reset Preliminary Hearing with Attorney Erdman.  Address updated and phone number confirmed.  NOH to be sent to Defendant and may appear in person or by Zoom video.

Preliminary hearing on May 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:30 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Devon R Doorn in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Devon R Doorn. 

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives further reading of same. Defendant wishes to have a preliminary hearing and waives time limits for the same.
Bond to continue.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:57 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Devon R Doorn appeared in court.
Court relates Public Defender has not been able to appoint counsel.  Next hearing may be by zoom.  Bond continued.  Court finds good cause to continue for appointment of counsel.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report
Adjourned initial appearance on March 8, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:58 AM Defendant Devon R Doorn appeared in court, Attorney John A Rafa Todd appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court relates no counsel has been appointed yet.  Address confirmed and phone number updated. AIA set and may appear by zoom.  Bond continues.  Reminder note given in court.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 8, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report
Adjourned initial appearance on February 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

01:21 PM Defendant Devon R Doorn in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond for today.  Defendant Devon R Doorn in custody.  Brian H. Wright appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Devon R Doorn appeared by zoom video means with Attorney by zoom video means.
Qualifies for Public Defender.  State relates.  Attorney Raymond relates.  Bond set.  Next hearing may be by zoom.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.
